meanings.definition: To remove moisture from the air.
meanings.sent1: I am dehumidifying the basement to prevent mold growth.
meanings.sent2: The dehumidifying machine is making the room feel more comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The dehumidifying process turned the damp air into a dry breeze.
meanings.sent4: She worked like a dehumidifying system, sucking out all the negativity around her.
meanings.sent5: The dehumidifying action transformed the room from muggy to fresh.

meanings.definition: The process of reducing the humidity in a space.
meanings.sent1: The dehumidifying of the room made it more pleasant to be in.
meanings.sent2: We installed a dehumidifying system to combat the moisture issue.
meanings.sent3: The dehumidifying in the greenhouse made the plants thrive.
meanings.sent4: His presence had a dehumidifying effect on the tense atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The dehumidifying of the attic saved the old books from damage.
